sources.title: Blackmail (1947) William Marshall, Adele Mara, Ricardo Cortez
sources.description: Blackmail is a 1947 American FILM NOlR crime film directed by Lesley Selander and starring William Marshall, Adele Mara and Ricardo Cortez. The lead character is based on a pulp magazine hero Dan Turner, Hollywood Detective.   You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia .

metadata.Plot: A private detective is approached by a wealthy entertainment executive to stop a blackmail scheme against him. Although he hasn't decided to take the job, the blackmailers believe that he already has, and he is marked for murder.
metadata.Writer: Royal K. Cole, Robert Leslie Bellem, Albert DeMond
metadata.Actors: William Marshall, Adele Mara, Ricardo Cortez
